name: tooltip
description: Component that associates a popup tooltip with a read-only element on the page

openDelay.description: The amount of time in milliseconds before the popup appears

displayDuration.description: The amount of time in milliseconds before the popup disappears of its own accord

hide.description: Forces the tooltip to hide if it is currently displayed

slots.description: The text or image that will be the hot-zone for the tooltip

tooltip.description: The contents that will be displayed in the tooltip popup
